heading.emphasis:
Macrotarsipodes tricinctus Le Cerf, 1916
comb. rev.

;

.

Macrotarsipodes tricincta Dalla Torre & Strand 1925: 7

.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material examined.
Holotype ♂ ( Fig. 41 ): Zoulouland [ South Africa , Kwazulu-Natal ] Dr. Martin leg. ( MNHN ); with labels: “Zoulouland / Dr. Martin ”; “TYPE”; “ Macrotarsipodes tricinctus / ♂ Type Le Cerf / Et. Lép. comp. XII fig. 3182, XIV p. 339 / F. LE CERF det. 1917”; “Ex Collection / Ch Oberthür / acquise en
IV-1925
/ par R. Biedermann ”.
